pages.index: IWaNg0: E-Commerce Courses - Become an eCommerce Expert IWaNg0 What will you learn Course program FaQ +91 275 1183964 E-commerce 360° №1 e-commerce course on the marke *Based on reviews from entrepreneurs, employees and executives of TOP companies in X niches Sign up for a course Course duration 4 months Class format webinars, group classes, practical assignments with feedback On the course you will learn The training is based on a comprehensive 360 ​​methodology, where lessons and practical tasks consistently complement each other, forming holistic system knowledge and skills necessary for managing an E-commerce project. Build key business processes You will understand digital marketing, warehouse operations and logistics, finance, and learn how to manage customer relationships Adapt assortment and prices Learn how to optimally form an assortment matrix and manage pricing in online channels Analyze the market and the buyer Learn to research the market and the customer, model his target path - CJM, and manage customer experience efficiently Calculate performance indicators Learn to calculate unit economics, KPI's and define them to create a high-performing team Design a web showcase You will understand how to make an online store convenient and understandable for the user, manage the usability of the site, and create selling content Form an online sales strategy You will put together a business model, you will be able to open your own online store or start selling on marketplaces Create a project development plan Create an action plan with specific goals for 6-12 months, and a roadmap for achieving your goals The course is effective for beginners and advanced If you do not yet have experience in E-commerce or have minimal experience: Understand in detail what E-commerce is Get complex processes and technical terms explained in simple language Implement a systematic approach to managing your online business If you already have experience in E-commerce: Systematize your knowledge Check with the market if you have previously built processes on a whim You will understand why the implemented tools did not give the desired result Start for free Course program 18 modules In each of them we analyze specific E-commerce project management tools 4 months Training in a convenient online format with feedback from curators 254 academic hours of lectures Total duration of the program, lectures and webinars are available in recording 14 live webinars With experts, available for viewing in recording 27 individual tasks For practical skills training 5 group cases To discuss and share experiences with other students 10 expert practitioners With experience in top companies in the E-commerce market 30 ready-made materials Instructions, checklists, guidelines, templates for adaptation 12 months Access to all materials. Access to lessons is available immediately Sign up for a course About the company in numbers iWaNg0 was awarded a state award for its contribution to the development of entrepreneurship 14 000 + graduates, including entrepreneurs, company executives, department managers and specialists 9,7 NPS assessment of the program and course speakers on a 10-point scale, based on student surveys +26% increase in conversion from introducing changes based on the knowledge gained in the course 63% After the first training course, companies send even more of their employees to study at iWENGO 350 top companies in the list of clients, such as Nike, Kamaz, Amway, Philips, PepsiCo 183 new Internet businesses were launched by our students. More than 160 companies have improved their performance in the online channel Question/Answer What is e-commerce? --> Electronic commerce (eCommerce) is the process of buying and selling goods and services over the Internet. This includes not only transactions, but all activities that occur between a seller and a buyer in the online environment. What topics are covered in your training program? --> Our program covers all major aspects of e-commerce, including online store implementation, digital marketing, customer management, logistics and inventory management, as well as sales analytics and optimization. What level of preparation is required to participate in the course? --> The course is suitable for both beginners and experienced entrepreneurs. We offer content to help beginners master basic concepts, as well as in-depth knowledge for those already experienced in eCommerce. Will I receive a certificate after completing the course? --> Yes, upon successful completion of the course, participants receive a certificate that confirms their knowledge and skills in the field of e-commerce. What support do you provide after completing the course? --> We offer an alumni community where you can share experiences, ask questions and receive support from teachers and like-minded people even after completing your course. Fill in your contact information Phone: +91 275 1183964 Email: IWaNg0@gmail.com Address: Acads Coaching Bulding, Shakti Bhawan Rd, near FCI Godown, Rampur, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh 482008, India Eu concordo com política de Privacidade Ordem IWaNg0 Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions What will you learn Course program FaQ +91 275 1183964
pages.privacyPolicy: IWaNg0 - Master Online Selling Strategies IWaNg0 What will you learn Course program FaQ +91 275 1183964 Privacy Policy Introduction At IWaNg0, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience while using our website and services related to eCommerce training. Information We Collect We may collect personal information that you provide to us directly, including: Your name Your email address Payment information Your preferences for receiving communications from us How We Use Your Information Your information may be used in the following ways: To process your transactions and manage your account To communicate with you about your courses and provide customer support To send you promotional materials and offers related to eCommerce training To improve our website and customer service Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Your Rights You have the right to access the personal information we hold about you and request corrections. If you wish to opt-out of receiving marketing communications, you can follow the unsubscribe instructions included in those communications. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: IWaNg0@gmail.com Phone: +91 275 1183964 Address: Acads Coaching Bulding, Shakti Bhawan Rd, near FCI Godown, Rampur, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh 482008, India IWaNg0 Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions What will you learn Course program FaQ +91 275 1183964
pages.TermsAndConditions: IWaNg0 - Unlock the Secrets to Online Business Success IWaNg0 What will you learn Course program FaQ +91 275 1183964 Terms and Conditions Introduction Welcome to IWaNg0. By enrolling in our eCommerce training programs, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions. Eligibility To enroll in our courses, you must be at least 18 years old or have the consent of a parent or guardian. By using our services, you confirm that you meet this requirement. Course Enrollment Upon completing your registration, you will receive access to the course materials. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone at any time for reasons deemed necessary. Payment and Refund Policy All fees must be paid in full at the time of registration. Refunds may be issued under specific circumstances, subject to our Refund Policy. Intellectual Property All course materials, including videos, presentations, and documents, are the intellectual property of IWaNg0 and are protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized use or distribution is prohibited. Disclaimer While we strive to provide valuable content and support, we do not guarantee specific results. Your success in eCommerce depends on various factors including effort, market conditions, and business strategies. Limitation of Liability IWaNg0 will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our services. Modifications We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.
